```{r}
# #DOW , #NIKKEI , #FTSE , #10yearT , #USDJPY , #VIX 
# 1300 * 900
rangeDays <- 60
symbolS <- c('^DJI','Dow Jones Industrial Average',
             '^N225','Nikkei 225',
             '^FTSE','FTSE 100',
             '^TNX','CBOE Interest Rate 10 Year T No',
             'JPY=X','USD/JPY',
             '^VIX','VOLATILITY S&P 500')
par(mfrow=c(3,2))
for(iii in seq(1,length(symbolS),by = 2)){
  price <-
    getSymbols(Symbols = symbolS[iii],auto.assign = F)
  pars <- chart_pars()
  pars$mar <- c(3,4,2,3)
  pars$cex <- 1
  dateRange <-
    paste0(range(tail(index(price),rangeDays)),collapse = '::')
  print(chart_Series(x = price,
                     pars = pars,
                     subset = dateRange,
                     name = symbolS[iii+1],
                     TA = if(10 <= nrow(price)){print(add_SMA())}))
}
```
